mapper.select: SELECT bc.book_date,bc.TIME_CODE_ID,bc.START_TIME, bc.END_TIME, b.id from ( SELECT book_date,TIME_CODE_ID,START_TIME,END_TIME from ( WITH RECURSIVE date_range AS ( SELECT STR_TO_DATE(#{today}, '%Y%m%d') AS book_date UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(_before.book_date, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS book_date FROM date_range AS _before WHERE DATEDIFF(_before.book_date, STR_TO_DATE(#{today}, '%Y%m%d')) < 14 ) SELECT book_date FROM date_range) sdate, TIME_CODE ) bc left join (select * from BOOK WHERE PERMIT ='1')b on bc.TIME_CODE_ID = b.TIME_CODE_ID and DATE_FORMAT(bc.book_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(b.book_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') where bc.time_code_id BETWEEN (SELECT g.START_TIME from GROUND g where g.GROUND_ID = #{ground_id} ) and (SELECT g.END_TIME from GROUND g where g.GROUND_ID =#{ground_id}) ORDER by bc.book_date, bc.time_code_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK( PERMIT, USER_ID, GROUND_ID, book_code, book_datetime, TIME_CODE_ID ) VALUES ( #{permit}, #{user_id}, #{ground_id}, #{book_code}, #{book_datetime}, #{time_code_id} )
